attributes.action: Give all ghurkas the automatic right to stay in britain on retirement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ghurkas have given their lives to this country for over 2oo years & to be discriminated against in the recent fashion is degrading & an insult to their loyalty.
Illegal immigrants & non welcome asylum seekers are better treat than the loyal fine upstanding & well respected ghurka.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
